DOC.brief_summary: Safety clinical performance BMR Face device ( manufactured Bio-Medical Research )
DOC.brief_title: Effect Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) Device Overall Facial Appearance
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate efficacy BMR Face device relation facial appearance 12 week compare baseline . Efficacy assess overall facial improvement assess live Investigator subject assessment facial appearance include Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale ( GAIS ) . The Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale five-grade subjective test . The physician patient independently describe degree improvement facial appearance . Possible response ( 1 ) Significantly mark improvement , ( 2 ) mark improvement , ( 3 ) moderate improvement , ( 4 ) slight improvement , ( 5 ) improvement Secondary objective evaluate safety evaluate subject 's investigator 's satisfaction ( live blind assessor ) BMR Face treatment .
DOC.criteria: Subjects able give voluntary , write informed consent participate study consent obtain include HIPAA authorization Subjects healthy female 35 55 year age Subjects Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1535 kg/m2 ( light underweighted light obese ) Subjects may skin type Subjects age relate skin laxity treatment area Subjects agree procedure affect facial volume ( filler fat transfer ) duration study Subjects agree procedure affect skin quality ( microdermabrasion , resurface , peel , laser , acne treatment , etc . ) duration study Subjects agree make change exist skincare regime study period Subjects agree avoid excessive sun radiation use appropriate sun protection SPF 30 high Subjects agree alter diet duration study Subjects understand study able follow study instruction willing attend require study visit Subjects agree photograph purpose study give consent photograph use marketing advertisement identity conceal photographs Subjects pregnant , plan become pregnant breastfeeding . A urine pregnancy test do rule pregnancy . Subjects childbearing potential use approved method birth control ( oral contraceptive , IUD , contraceptive implant , barrier method spermicide abstinence ) Subjects understand willing comply requirement study Subjects dermatologic condition include acne , rosacea , eczema , psoriasis , severe sun damage scar within treatment area Subjects know cancer include skin cancer ( Basal Cell Carcinoma , Squamous Cell Carcinoma Melanoma ) Subjects history heart disease stroke Subjects active implant medical device ( pacemaker , pump etc ) Subjects metal implant . Dental implant filling allow well piercings long treatment area . Subjects use tan bed past four week plan use tan bed duration study Subjects HIV positive Subjects systemic corticosteroid therapy past 6 month Subjects facial dermabrasion , chemical peel , laser , IPL treatment past 6 month Subjects use botulinum toxin , hyaluronic acid , collagen , fat injection /or method skin augmentation ( enhancement inject implanted material ) past 6 month Subjects ablative resurfacing procedure , brow lift , blepharoplasty face lift treat area past 12 month Subjects surgery treat area past 12 month Subjects exist medical condition Investigator considers may put subject risk compromise participation study Subjects participate another research study past 30 day Subjects currently involved injury litigation claim Subjects use BMR Face device previously
